Ingredients.1: 2 pounds lean venison, cut into thin strips

Ingredients.2: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer (such as Budweiser®)

Ingredients.8: 0.5 teaspoon ground black pepper, or more to taste

Directions.1: Removing all fat and gristle from venison.

Directions.2: Mix venison with beer, soy sauce, Worcestershire, salt, garlic, curry powder, black pepper, and ginger together in a medium stainless steel bowl. Cover and refrigerate for at least 8 hours, or overnight.

Directions.3: Remove venison from the marinade and shake off excess. Discard the remaining marinade.

Directions.4: Place the meat on the racks of a dehydrator, so that there is room for the air to flow evenly over all of the pieces.

Directions.5: Let dehydrate to desired consistency according to individual appliance instructions, 6 to 8 hours.
